name: Zoo Clicker
description: The game zoo clicker is a clicker game you have to build your own zoo, you have to press the button of the entrance card and so you get money, and with the money you can buy animals after you buy three animals from the same type you unlock another animal, if you buy five animals from the same type ( level max )  the animal change color , and if you have enough money you can buy a new zoo with other animals!
